# LayerRenderer.Configuration

**Structure**

A type that stores the texture formats, layout information, and other details you use to configure your rendering loop code.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Configuration
```

## Overview

A [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/LayerRenderer/Configuration-swift.struct] type stores the configuration options for your app’s [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/LayerRenderer] object. When configuring your app’s [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/CompositorLayer] type, use this type to specify information about the texture layouts, pixel formats, and rendering options you want. The system uses the provided information to initialize the [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/LayerRenderer] object. It also uses the information to create the Metal textures and other data structures that you use for each frame of content.

You don’t create this type directly. When implementing the [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/CompositorLayerConfiguration/makeConfiguration(capabilities:configuration:)] method of your [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/CompositorLayerConfiguration] type, the system passes a set of default configuration values for you to modify.

## Configuring the color textures

- **colorFormat**: The pixel format to use for color textures.
- **colorUsage**: The texture usage value to apply to the layer’s color textures.

## Configuring the depth information

- **depthFormat**: The pixel format to use for the layer’s depth textures.
- **depthUsage**: The texture usage value to apply to the layer’s depth textures.
- **defaultDepthRange**: The distances to the far and near clipping planes that define the bounds of your content.

## Configuring the texture layout

- **layout**: The layout being used by the layer.
- **LayerRenderer.Layout**: Constants that specify the organization of the textures you use for drawing.

## Configuring the foveation setting

- **isFoveationEnabled**: A value that indicates if the layer is using variable rasterization rates.
- **generateFlippedRasterizationRateMaps**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the layer renderer provides rasterization rate maps flipped around the y-axis.

## Configurating the render context

- **drawableRenderContextStencilFormat**: The metal pixel format matching that of the stencil texture used in the layer renderer drawable’s render context.
- **drawableRenderContextRasterSampleCount**: The multisample antialiasing sample count used for rendering.

## Configuring quality level

- **maxRenderQuality**: The max render quality the layer can use when drawing to the drawables.

## Instance Properties

- **supportsMTL4**: Whether the layer supports drawing using Metal4, if false assumed to be using Metal3.
- **trackingAreasFormat**: The pixel format used when creating the tracking areas textures for the layer.
- **trackingAreasUsage**: The texture usage value used when creating the tracking areas textures for the layer.

## Configuring the layer renderer

- **configuration**: The configuration details for the specified layer.
- **LayerRenderer.Capabilities**: The color formats, depth formats, and features that you can use to configure your rendering engine.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
